Name: Beautiful Girl Fight School
About the game: ·This is a beautiful girl fighting game. ·Players control characters to fight with beautiful girls and experience various interesting stories in the Academy. ·There are up to 22 beautiful girls in the game. ·In terms of operation, you can choose the challenging manual continuous move mode or the simple automatic continuous move mode. ·Story mode: experience colorful plots. ·Training mode: learn all kinds of fighting skills. ·Challenge mode: fight with the specified character. ·All in all, for you who like the role of beautiful girl or fighting game, this is an independent game that can't be missed! ·Disclaimer: all characters in the game have reached the age of 18!
